snippet: In “The Birthday Boys,” which begins Friday night on IFC, the all-male troupe relies on a running gag throughout each episode.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews IFC comedy television series The Birthday Boys, starring Bob Odenkirk.
lead_paragraph: In “The Birthday Boys,” which begins Friday night on IFC, the all-male troupe relies on a running gag throughout each episode.

headline.seo: ‘The Birthday Boys,’ a New Sketch Comedy on IFC
headline.main: Take It, and Run With It
headline.print_headline: Take It, and Run With It
